com.solacesystems.jcsmp

Class DestinationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solacesystems.jcsmp.DestinationUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DestinationUtilsImpl

    public abstract class DestinationUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for working with Destinations and marshaling them to Strings (network names).

    A temporary destination is only valid for consumption within the session that created it; it is recommended to use JCSMPSession.createTemporaryQueue() and JCSMPSession.createTemporaryTopic() to acquire new instances of temporary destinations, instead of this utility.

    Validation is not performed on parameters passed into these utility functions. As a consequence, it is only valid to use names obtained from the JCSMP API.

      • onlyInstance

        public static DestinationUtils onlyInstance()
        Get a concrete instance of this utility class.
        Returns:

      • queueFromEncodedName

        @Deprecated
public abstract Destination queueFromEncodedName(String name)
        Deprecated. See queueFromNetworkName(String).

      • queueFromNetworkName

        public abstract Destination queueFromNetworkName(String name)
        Creates an (optionally temporary) Queue from the supplied name. The durability of the destination is inferred from the name.

        An encoded network name must be obtained from getEncodedName(Destination).

        Parameters:
        name - A valid Queue name obtained from the API.
        Returns:
        A new Queue Destination instance.

      • topicFromEncodedName

        @Deprecated
public abstract Destination topicFromEncodedName(String name)
        Deprecated. See topicFromNetworkName(String).

      • topicFromNetworkName

        public abstract Destination topicFromNetworkName(String name)
        Creates an (optionally temporary) Topic from the supplied name. The durability of the destination is inferred from the name.

        An encoded network name must be obtained from getEncodedName(Destination).

        Parameters:
        name - A valid Topic name obtained from the API.
        Returns:
        A new Topic Destination instance.

      • getEncodedName

        @Deprecated
public abstract String getEncodedName(Destination destination)
        Deprecated. See getNetworkName(Destination).

      • getNetworkName

        public abstract String getNetworkName(Destination destination)
        Returns the String representing a Queue or Topic destination in an encoded network name form.
        Parameters:
        destination - A Destination instance, must be an instance of a Queue or Topic.
        Returns:
        A String representing the destination.
